product_name: Vittoria Diamante Pro Radiale Foldable Tire - 700 x 22 / 24
long_description: The Vittoria Diamante Pro Radiale foldable tire blends race-ready performance, a great ride quality and light weight, all at a great value. 220 tpi nylon casing offers a wonderfully supple ride quality, even at high pressures; Radiale casing design places cord plies 85deg to direction of travel. Because of the direction of the cords, casing flexibility is enhanced, resulting in more a more forgiving ride quality without compromising traction. Bead-to-bead flat protection reduces chances of puncture from road debris. 1mm reduction in tire width helps lower weight and offers a narrower profile for slight aerodynamic gains. Tire crown's rubber compound is optimized for low rolling resistance and long life; shoulder compound is softer and grippier for confident cornering. Recommended pressure for the Vittoria Diamante Pro Radiale foldable tire is 100 - 145 psi (7 - 10 BAR).
short_description: The Vittoria Diamante Pro Radiale foldable tire blends race-ready performance, a great ride quality and light weight, all at a great value.
